3template <typename T, typename Op>
4[[kernel]] void ternary_v(
5 device const bool* a,
6 device const T* b,
7 device const T* c,
8 device T* d,
9 uint index [[thread_position_in_grid]]) {
10 d[index] = Op()(a[index], b[index], c[index]);
11}
12
13template <typename T, typename Op>
14[[kernel]] void ternary_v2(
15 device const bool* a,
16 device const T* b,
17 device const T* c,
18 device T* d,
19 uint2 index [[thread_position_in_grid]],
20 uint2 grid_dim [[threads_per_grid]]) {
21 auto offset = index.x + grid_dim.x * int64_t(index.y);
22 d[offset] = Op()(a[offset], b[offset], c[offset]);
23}
24
25template <typename T, typename Op, typename IdxT = int64_t>
26[[kernel]] void ternary_g_nd1(
27 device const bool* a,
28 device const T* b,
29 device const T* c,
30 device T* d,
31 constant const int64_t& a_strides,
32 constant const int64_t& b_strides,
33 constant const int64_t& c_strides,
34 uint index [[thread_position_in_grid]]) {
35 auto a_idx = elem_to_loc_1<IdxT>(index, a_strides);
36 auto b_idx = elem_to_loc_1<IdxT>(index, b_strides);
37 auto c_idx = elem_to_loc_1<IdxT>(index, c_strides);
38 d[index] = Op()(a[a_idx], b[b_idx], c[c_idx]);
39}
40
41template <typename T, typename Op, typename IdxT = int64_t>
42[[kernel]] void ternary_g_nd2(
43 device const bool* a,
44 device const T* b,
45 device const T* c,
46 device T* d,
47 constant const int64_t a_strides[2],
48 constant const int64_t b_strides[2],
49 constant const int64_t c_strides[2],
50 uint2 index [[thread_position_in_grid]],
51 uint2 grid_dim [[threads_per_grid]]) {
52 auto a_idx = elem_to_loc_2<IdxT>(index, a_strides);
53 auto b_idx = elem_to_loc_2<IdxT>(index, b_strides);
54 auto c_idx = elem_to_loc_2<IdxT>(index, c_strides);
55 IdxT out_idx = index.x + IdxT(grid_dim.x) * index.y;
56 d[out_idx] = Op()(a[a_idx], b[b_idx], c[c_idx]);
57}
58
59template <typename T, typename Op, typename IdxT = int64_t>
60[[kernel]] void ternary_g_nd3(
61 device const bool* a,
62 device const T* b,
63 device const T* c,
64 device T* d,
65 constant const int64_t a_strides[3],
66 constant const int64_t b_strides[3],
67 constant const int64_t c_strides[3],
68 uint3 index [[thread_position_in_grid]],
69 uint3 grid_dim [[threads_per_grid]]) {
70 auto a_idx = elem_to_loc_3<IdxT>(index, a_strides);
71 auto b_idx = elem_to_loc_3<IdxT>(index, b_strides);
72 auto c_idx = elem_to_loc_3<IdxT>(index, c_strides);
73 IdxT out_idx = index.x + grid_dim.x * (index.y + IdxT(grid_dim.y) * index.z);
74 d[out_idx] = Op()(a[a_idx], b[b_idx], c[c_idx]);
75}
76
77template <typename T, typename Op, int N = 1, typename IdxT = int64_t>
78[[kernel]] void ternary_g(
79 device const bool* a,
80 device const T* b,
81 device const T* c,
82 device T* d,
83 constant const int* shape,
84 constant const int64_t* a_strides,
85 constant const int64_t* b_strides,
86 constant const int64_t* c_strides,
87 constant const int& ndim,
88 uint3 index [[thread_position_in_grid]],
89 uint3 grid_dim [[threads_per_grid]]) {
90 auto idx = elem_to_loc_3_nd<IdxT>(
91 {N * index.x, index.y, index.z},
92 shape,
93 a_strides,
94 b_strides,
95 c_strides,
96 ndim);
97 auto xshape = shape[ndim - 1];
98 IdxT out_idx = N * index.x + xshape * (index.y + IdxT(grid_dim.y) * index.z);
99 IdxT a_xstride = a_strides[ndim - 1];
100 IdxT b_xstride = b_strides[ndim - 1];
101 IdxT c_xstride = c_strides[ndim - 1];
102 for (int i = 0; i < N && (int(N * index.x) + i) < xshape; ++i) {
103 d[out_idx++] = Op()(a[idx.x], b[idx.y], c[idx.z]);
104 idx.x += a_xstride;
105 idx.y += b_xstride;
106 idx.z += c_xstride;
107 }
108}

METAL_FUNC vec< IdxT, 3 > elem_to_loc_3_nd(uint3 elem, constant const int *shape, constant const int64_t *a_strides, constant const int64_t *b_strides, constant const int64_t *c_strides, int ndim)
